title: Single Of The Week: Colin Stetson – The Stars in His Head (Dark Lights Remix)
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/03/ColinStetson67231.jpg "ColinStetson67231")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/5582-single-of-the-week-colin-stetson-the-stars-in-his-head-dark-lights-remix/attachment/colinstetson67231)

It’s not often we feel the need to apologies here at CITR towers, mostly because we’re pretty damn good to you. Our failure to review, or at the very least cover, Colin Stetson’s LP ‘New History Warfare Vol. 2: Judges’ however was a rare moment when apologies and forgiveness were definitely in order.

Because of our compulsive need to please however, we want to make it up to you in the name of a single of the week. Below is the video of my standout from the much-acclaimed LP. Enjoy, and have a great seven days. JC
